name: Citrus Burst
description: A refreshing and energizing fragrance that captures the essence of a Mediterranean summer. This vibrant scent opens with zesty lemon, bergamot, and grapefruit, creating an invigorating burst of citrus. The heart reveals fresh mint and green tea, while the base of white musk and cedar provides a clean, modern finish. Perfect for daytime wear and warm weather.

name: Vanilla Dreams
description: A warm and comforting fragrance that wraps you in a cloud of sweetness and sophistication. This luxurious scent features creamy vanilla, tonka bean, and caramel, creating a gourmand experience that's both indulgent and elegant. Subtle notes of sandalwood and vanilla orchid add depth and complexity. Perfect for cozy evenings and intimate moments.

name: Woody Essence
description: A sophisticated and masculine fragrance that embodies strength and elegance. This powerful scent opens with fresh bergamot and black pepper, leading to a heart of rich cedar and vetiver. The base of sandalwood, patchouli, and leather creates a warm, woody finish that exudes confidence and refinement. Perfect for the modern gentleman.

name: Amber Mystique
description: A mysterious and alluring fragrance that captivates the senses with its warm, golden glow. This enchanting scent features rich amber, vanilla, and incense, creating a mystical atmosphere that's both sensual and spiritual. Subtle notes of rose and jasmine add floral elegance, while sandalwood and musk provide a luxurious base. Perfect for special occasions and romantic evenings.
